question: The legacies or adaptations of legacies from the Mongol empire are varied. Most notably, they include which of the following selections?
The Mongol empire used which of the following to integrate its vast, geographically diverse area?
choices: Expansion of bureaucracy to reinforce dominance
The use of state-sponsored religion to legitimize the government
Expansion of an interregional canal system
